snippet.title: Chop Chop Guys - Steam Next Fest: October 2023 Demo
snippet.description:
Chop Chop Guys is a multiplayer... [Tape Rewind Sound Effect]. Chop Chop Guys is meant to be a multiplayer party royale game. And it will be. Eventually. Just not yet. So what is this all about?

Chop Chop Guys is a game where you can run around strange levels, dodging eggs that explode on your head. Or shoot other dummies with splattering paint. Or roll on your stomach down a snow slope, trying not to crash into a pole under the gaze of shaking mammoths. Stomp on the disco floor and play darts with YOURSELF. In other words, do a lot of strange and fun things.

For participating in competitions, you will be awarded J-Cash (now all games have some weird bucks, so we won't lag behind), which you can spend on clothes for your Bob. By the way, Bob is a gentle name for our character. No idea why.

Chop Chop Guys (C) Flawless Fun Co.
Release Date: TBD

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #steamnextfest #steamnextfestoctober2023 #chopchopguys #battleroyale #slapstick #comedy
